pages.index: DoorCraft - Best Doors Models Materials Reviews Connections Transform Your Space with Our Exquisite Door Collection Contact Us Our Company At DoorCraft, we are dedicated to transforming your home with our exquisite collection of doors. Our mission is to provide high-quality, beautifully crafted doors that enhance the aesthetic and functionality of any space. Our doors are not just entryways but statement pieces that add a touch of elegance and sophistication to your home. We offer a wide range of styles, from classic to contemporary, ensuring there is a perfect door for every taste and design preference. Each door in our collection is meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality. Whether you are looking for a grand entrance door or a sleek interior door, we have something to suit your needs. At DoorCraft, we believe that the right door can elevate your home’s decor and create a lasting impression. DoorCraft has been a trusted name in the door industry for over 20 years, providing exceptional quality and design to our customers. With more than 5000 active customers every month, we have established a reputation for excellence and reliability. Our extensive experience allows us to understand and meet the diverse needs of homeowners, ensuring satisfaction with every purchase. We pride ourselves on our innovative designs, which blend tradition with modernity to suit any style. Our commitment to quality craftsmanship and customer service has made us a leader in the market. At DoorCraft, we strive to continue our legacy of creating beautiful and durable doors for every home. In our company we understand that your home is a reflection of your personality, and our goal is to help you express it through our beautifully crafted doors. Our premium door collection includes everything from grand entrance doors, perfect for making a statement, to sleek interior doors that seamlessly blend with your home decor. Our doors are designed to add elegance and functionality to any space, enhancing the overall ambiance of your home. We believe in the power of great design to transform living spaces, and our doors are created with this philosophy in mind. Our team of experts is passionate about door design and works tirelessly to bring you the best in craftsmanship and style. From the initial concept to the final product, we ensure that every detail is perfect, so you can enjoy stunning and durable doors. We offer a variety of styles and finishes to complement any decor scheme, from modern minimalist to classic luxurious. Our doors are designed to be versatile, allowing you to create a cohesive look throughout your home. We are committed to sustainability and use eco-friendly practices in our manufacturing processes to protect the environment. Join us on our journey to make the world a more beautiful place, one elegant door at a time. "When one door closes, another opens" Our gallery features an exquisite selection of entrance doors, meticulously crafted with precision and care. Each door in our collection represents the perfect harmony of elegance and strength. Discover our premium entrance doors that elevate the aesthetic appeal and security of your home. Siren Price: 325,00 Buy Latte Price: 215,00 Buy Bengal Price: 189,00 Buy Oxford Price: 280,00 Buy Up to 30% discount Explore our premium door set collection What makes our brand different? Next day as default Place your order before 3pm and receive it the next day as standard. We pride ourselves on our fast and reliable shipping services. Your satisfaction is our priority and we guarantee on-time deliveries. Made by real craftsmen Craft products made by hand with real passion and skill. Each product is unique, reflecting the dedication and skill of our artisans. We believe in the value of quality craftsmanship. Unbeatable prices For our materials and quality, you won't find better prices anywhere. Our commitment to affordability does not compromise our high standards. We offer exceptional value for premium products. Premium materials At DoorCraft, we use only the finest materials to craft our doors. Each door is constructed with high-grade wood, robust metals, and top-quality finishes to ensure longevity and exceptional performance. Our materials are selected for their durability, aesthetic appeal, and ability to withstand the elements, providing you with doors that are both beautiful and resilient. Simply elegant Our interior doors are a testament to our dedication to exquisite craftsmanship. With attention to every detail, from seamless joints to smooth finishes, our doors exemplify the highest standards of quality and aesthetic appeal. Mane Price: 180,00 Buy Retro Price: 150,00 Buy Nordic Price: 240,00 Buy Madena Price: 350,00 Buy Frequently Asked Questions What types of doors does DoorCraft offer? DoorCraft offers a wide range of doors including interior doors, exterior doors, French doors, sliding doors, and custom-designed doors. Each type is available in various materials and finishes to suit your specific needs and aesthetic preferences. How do I choose the right door for my home? Choosing the right door depends on various factors such as the style of your home, the level of security you need, and your personal preferences. Our experts at DoorCraft are always available to help you make an informed decision based on your specific requirements. Can I customize my door? Yes, DoorCraft offers customization options for many of our doors. You can choose from different materials, finishes, colors, and hardware to create a door that perfectly fits your space and style. What materials are DoorCraft doors made from? Our doors are made from a variety of high-quality materials including solid wood, engineered wood, glass, steel, and fiberglass. Each material offers unique benefits and aesthetics, ensuring we have something to meet every need and preference. How do I maintain my DoorCraft door? Maintenance depends on the material of your door. Generally, it involves regular cleaning with appropriate products, checking and lubricating hardware, and occasionally repainting or refinishing wood doors. Specific care instructions are provided with each door to ensure longevity. Do DoorCraft doors come with a warranty? Yes, all DoorCraft doors come with a comprehensive warranty. The terms of the warranty vary depending on the type of door and materials used. Please refer to our warranty information or contact our customer service for specific details. How long does it take to install a DoorCraft door? The installation time can vary depending on the type of door and the specifics of the installation site. Typically, a standard door installation can be completed within a few hours. Custom doors or complex installations may take longer. What should I expect during the installation process? During installation, our professional team will remove your old door, prepare the opening, and install your new DoorCraft door. They will ensure everything is properly aligned and functioning before cleaning up the workspace and providing you with any necessary maintenance tips. Does DoorCraft offer installation services? Yes, DoorCraft offers professional installation services to ensure your door is installed correctly and functions properly. Our experienced installers will handle everything from removal of the old door to final adjustments and clean-up. How can I get a quote for a DoorCraft door? You can request a quote by visiting our website and filling out the contact form, or by calling our customer service team. We will provide a detailed quote based on your specific needs and preferences. Materials We are committed to sourcing only the highest quality materials to ensure our products meet the highest standards of excellence. Our team meticulously selects top-grade woods, metals, and fabrics from trusted suppliers to create furniture that is both durable and beautiful. We believe great design starts with great materials, which is why we never compromise on the quality of our raw materials. Every piece of door begins with carefully selected wood, chosen for its strength, grain, and sustainability. By selecting the finest materials, we ensure that our products are not only beautiful but also resilient, providing you with lasting value and satisfaction. Our modern doors have bases and designs made from high quality woods for stability and a sleek, modern look. We use only the finest materials, from the handle to the face and frame, ensuring a luxurious feel and durability. Our commitment to quality extends to every component of our products, from the smallest screw to the largest panel. We work closely with our material suppliers to ensure that every piece we create is built to last and withstand the test of time. Our premium decor items are crafted from high-quality materials that not only look stunning but also contribute to the longevity of the products. Some good words What lucky customers say about us Emily Johnson: "I am extremely pleased with the front door I purchased from DoorCraft. The craftsmanship is outstanding and it has truly elevated the appearance of my home!" Michael Brown: "Your doors are simply exceptional! You add a sense of security and elegance to my home. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for high-quality doors." Jessica Davis: "My new interior door from DoorCraft is fantastic! It not only looks beautiful but also functions perfectly. This door has become a key feature in my home." Christopher Miller: "Their doors are stunning! They combine the perfect mix of durability and style. Now, every guest compliments the look of our home." Sarah Wilson: "My new entrance door from DoorCraft exceeded all my expectations! It not only enhances the curb appeal of my home but also provides excellent insulation and security." David Martinez: "The DoorCraft door we purchased is the perfect blend of elegance and functionality. I am delighted with every aspect of this product and recommend DoorCraft to everyone." pages.privacy: DoorCraft - Privacy Policy Home Privacy Policy Data Collection At DoorCraft, we collect personal data to provide you with the best possible service. This includes the information you provide when making purchases, subscribing to our newsletter, or interacting with our website. Use of Data The data we collect is used to enhance your experience with our products and services. This includes processing orders, personalizing your experience, and improving our offerings. Data Sharing We do not share your personal data with third parties except as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, or protect our rights. Data Security We implement robust security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Cookies We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. These cookies help us understand how you use our site and allow us to improve its functionality. Third-Party Services Our site may contain links to third-party services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these services and encourage you to read their privacy policies. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also object to the processing of your data under certain circumstances. Data Retention We retain your personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, comply with legal obligations, or protect our rights. Changes to This Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we encourage you to review it regularly. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy or the data we hold about you, please contact us at doorcraft@gmail.com International Data Transfers Your personal data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that any such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws. Home Terms and conditions © Copyright DoorCraft
pages.terms: Terms and Conditions - DoorCraft Home Terms and Conditions Entire Agreement These terms and conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and DoorCraft regarding the use of our website and services. Any other agreements or understandings are hereby superseded. Acceptance of Terms By accessing and using our website, you accept and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, you should not use our website. Modifications DoorCraft reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website. Your continued use of the site constitutes acceptance of the revised terms. Privacy Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our practices regarding your personal information. Use of the Website You agree to use our website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of others or restrict or inhibit their use and enjoyment of the website. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of DoorCraft or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. Product Descriptions We strive to ensure that the product descriptions on our website are accurate and complete. However, we do not warrant that the descriptions are error-free. Pricing All prices listed on our website are subject to change without notice. We are not responsible for typographical errors in pricing. Returns and Refunds Please review our Return Policy for information on returns and refunds. Your purchase constitutes acceptance of our return policy. Limitation of Liability DoorCraft will not be liable for any damages arising from the use of our website or the purchase of our products, except as expressly stated in these terms and conditions. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the state in which DoorCraft operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Dispute Resolution Any disputes arising from the use of our website or the purchase of our products will be resolved through binding arbitration, in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions, please contact us at doorcraft@gmail.com Home Privacy Policy © Copyright DoorCraft
